body.name: imarku Frying Pan - 12inch Non Stick Frying Pan Honeycomb Cast Iron Skillets, Large Frying Pans Nonstick Dishwasher Safe, Oven Safe Kitchen Pans for Cooking With Stay-cool Wood Handle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 24 mins
features: Experience the Next Level of Cooking: Meticulously crafted with the innovative combination of cast iron pan and nonstick technology. Not only provides an exceptional nonstick surface but also minimizes the contact area between food and the frying pan. Ensuring true nonstick performance while extending the cooking pan lifespan. Say goodbye to stubborn food and enjoy effortless cooking and cleaning like never before.

Perfectly Cook with Even Heat Distribution: Make the most of the even heat distribution and fast heating properties offered by cast iron skillets, your meals will stay warm for longer periods. the oil in the pot evenly in the frying pan nonstick of the honeycomb, allowing for cooking with minimal oil and reducing fat intake. This innovative feature maximizes the unique flavors and characteristics of your ingredients, unlocking the secret to delicious and healthy meals.

Stay-cool Safe Cooking Time: Featuring fireproof and stay-cool ergonomic handles that prioritize your comfort and safe. With the frying pan detachable wood handle design, you effortlessly remove the handle and store it in your locker whenever desired, allowing for convenient storage and saving over 55% of kitchen space. Additionally, the frying pan handle is equipped with a hole that doubles as a hanging option, providing further convenience in your kitchen.

Suitable For All Stoves - The 12inch non stick frying pan is designed to fit all types of stoves such as ceramic, electric, gas, grill and induction. 12inch is incredibly practical for personal or family use. Cook with confidence as the nonstick frying pans can safely withstand temperatures up to 500°F. Whether you're frying egg, lightly pressure cooking, grilling, etc., the pan for cooking nonstick are perfect for all your culinary needs.

Super Durable & Convenient: The cooking pans is equipped with exceptional durability and rust-proof features, guaranteeing long-lasting non-stick performance without the hassle of frequent maintenance. Enjoy the convenience of lighter pans compared to traditional cast iron skillets, while still maintaining perfect balance with the handle. Bid farewell to tilting and experience maximum stability and security during use.

Easy To Clean & Gift Warranty - The seamless rivet design avoid dirt and grime buildup, Simply rinse with water and mild detergent to quickly remove stains. The non stick frying pan set are dishwasher safe, but hand wash is recommended for maximum longevity. (note: handle should be removed before placing in the dishwasher). We provide a lifetime warranty and 24*7 customer service ensures quick resolution of any issues, making it an excellent choice for personal use or as a gift for friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Cast IRON frying PAN
reviews.reviewText: Recently bought Imarku knife set on a great deal and came across the frying pans.Bought the 12 inch pan to start with and pretty impressed with the build quality and the non stick property.Its very heavy and great for searing the meat/protein. Compared with Hexclad, i would say at times Hexclad does stick but this one is completely non stick. It does say it is dishwasher safe but again we do not want risk it as this literally can last life time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, heavy duty non-stick pan
reviews.reviewText: This pan heats very evenly, the non-stick works well so far, and it handles high heat. I really like these pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Frying Pan
reviews.reviewText: Great frying pan! Gets hot fast, and cooks evenly. Only Downside is the weight, but would make for a formidable home defense weapon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean!
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's very easy to clean after each usage. I use it to make eggs and bacon in the morning and saute meat and veggies for our daily meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this skillet. It cleans up very well. I would order another (and give it five stars) if it had a small handle on the opposite side from the long one. I don't have a lot of strength in my hands, so lifting and pouring with one hand is hard for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this product is really great. I used for one month then only thought this is worth of 5 star review. Great team to use for chicken and lamb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pan Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Gave this pan to each adult son for Christmas and they both love it! No stick, nice size 12 inch! More money than others but worth the cost….watch for it on sale!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The frypan arrived on time and in person condition. Used the frypan tonight and worked great . Very heavy duty.
